headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://appssdk.zoom.us; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https:; connect-src 'self' https://zoom.us https://*.zoom.us; frame-ancestors 'self' https://zoom.us https://*.zoom.us; font-src 'self' data:;
